title: Runwind Plus Size Dresses Women Fit and Flare A-Line Swing Dress 3/4 Sleeve Midi Church Wedding Guest Cocktail Party Dresses
description: 【COMFORTABLE MATERIALS】This 3/4 sleeve dress for women is made of 92% polyester and 8% elastane. Soft and stretchy fabric make you feel comfortable in all days. Has good drape, not easy to wrinkle, convenient to store and clean. Size: X -5XL, fited for women of all shapes and sizes.

【FIT AND FLARED DRESS】This flattering swing dress with large hemline is elegant, wearing this a-line fit and flare dress makes you be highlight and full of charm in the crowd, will receive lots of compliments.

【EMBELISH YOUR CURVES】Plus size a-line dresses for curvy women is designed to accentuates your waistline and body proportions, empire waist-slimming design visually elongates the legs nicely and show off your classical, womanly shape.

【DESIGN HIGHLIGHT】Round neck with V notch design, modest and elegant, get you good face and neck line, match with a necklace you like, add gentleness, fashion sense. 3/4 sleeve knee length midi dress is versatile, make it wearable in four seasons. Dress with side pockets makes it easy for you to carry phone or useful items.

【MATCH & OCCASIONS】Simple solid color style, it is easy to pair with any high heels, earings, necklace and handbags for a stylish look. Plus size modest dress is suitable for casual, semi-formal occasions, like wedding, cocktail, tea party, church, work, business office work, holiday, dating, birthday and daily life.
